directions: Cut a paper-thin slice off both ends of eggs and halve eggs crosswise. Force yolks through a sieve into a bowl (or mash with a fork) and stir in remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste. Transfer filling to a pastry bag fitted with a large plain or decorative tip and pipe into whites, mounding it. The stuffed eggs may be made 6 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 6 Kalamata or other brine-cured black olives, pitted and minced
2 to 3 tablespoons minced fresh flat-leafed parsley leaves
Garnish: Black olive slivers and chopped parsley leaves
title: Olive and Anchovy Stuffed Eggs
